title: The pricing game
content:
Can anyone suggest a font similar to this?   
Thanks!   
 ![font x](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011104523im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/12066.jpg)
author: fuentes bo

comments.content:
Or for a crusty version check this: [AT Tenement](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011104523/http:/typophile.com/node/177)   
Free to you if you send me an image of whatever you found   
to use it for!   
   
Randy
